main event: An observer in Fort Smith, Arkansas sighted a round object that appeared shiny and reflective, reminiscent of a huge round mirror, on 16 April 1949.
interesting points: The object was seen for approximately one minute while it followed a straight and level line of flight before disappearing behind trees., The observer described the object as about the size of a five-cent coin held at arm's length., The object was colorless and bright, possibly with a clear white light surrounding it., No sound or trail was observed during the sighting., The observer was able to point out the object to several other people in the area.
witness description: An observer employed as a special delivery carrier by the US Post Office, known to have an excellent reputation.
